sst_bk1_direction_errors.Description: Block 1: number of incorrect Go trials.

sst_bk1_median_rt.Description: Block 1: median RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_bk2_median_rt.Description: Block 2: median RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_bk1_percent_go_response.Description: Block 1: percent correct on Go trials.

sst_bk2_direction_errors.Description: Block 2: number of incorrect Go trials.

sst_ses_quant_rt.Description: Session: quantile calculation of all correct Go RT values (from selecting point in CorrectGo RT distribution based on Block 1 Quantile Value)

sst_bk1_stdev_rt.Description: Block 1: standard deviation of RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_bk1_pctinhib_ladder2.Description: Block 1: percent inhibition on Stop trials from Ladder 2.

sst_ses_ssrt.Description: Session: median RT (from correct Go trials, where RT ! 0) minus the Block 1 QuantileValue; This is an alternative, though less optimal, method for calculating SSRT.

sst_bk2_ssd50.Description: Block 2: mean of all SSD values from both ladders.

sst_bk2_ssrt_quant.Description: Block 2: SSRT. Quantile RT minus SSD50 (mean of all SSD values from both ladders).

sst_bk1_ssrt.Description: Block 1: median RT (from correct Go trials, where RT ! 0) minus the Block 1 QuantileValue; This is an alternative, though less optimal, method for calculating SSRT.

sst_bk2_ladder2mean.Description: Block 2: mean of all SSD values from Ladder 2.

sst_bk1_ssrt_quant.Description: Block 1: SSRT. Quantile RT minus SSD50 (mean of all SSD values from both ladders).

sst_ses_mean_rt.Description: Session: mean RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_bk1_pctinhib_ladder1.Description: Block 1: percent inhibition on Stop trials from Ladder 1.

sst_bk1_percent_inhib.Description: Block 1: percent inhibition on all Stop trials.

sst_ses_pctinhib_ladder2.Description: Session: percent inhibition on Stop trials from Ladder 2.

sst_ses_quantilevalue.Description: Session: 1 minus total percent inhibition on all Stop trials.

sst_ses_ssd50.Description: Session: mean of all SSD values from both ladders.

sst_bk2_mean_rt.Description: Block 2: mean RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_ses_pctinhib_ladder1.Description: Session: percent inhibition on Stop trials from Ladder 1.

sst_bk2_endtrial.Description: Block 2: End Trial. Total recorded trials of block 2 (should be 128).

sst_ses_ladder1mean.Description: Session: mean of all SSD values from Ladder 1.

sst_bk2_stdev_rt.Description: Block 2: standard deviation of RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_bk2_quant_rt.Description: Block 2: quantile calculation of all correct Go RT values (from selecting point in CorrectGo RT distribution based on Block 1 Quantile Value)

sst_ses_percent_inhib.Description: Session: percent inhibition on all Stop trials.

sst_bk1_mean_rt.Description: Block 1: mean RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_ses_percent_go_response.Description: Session: percent correct on Go trials.

sst_bk1_ladder1mean.Description: Block 1: mean of all SSD values from Ladder 1.

sst_bk2_percent_go_response.Description: Block 2: percent correct on Go trials.

sst_bk2_ssrt.Description: Block 2: median RT (from correct Go trials, where RT ! 0) minus the Block 1 QuantileValue; This is an alternative, though less optimal, method for calculating SSRT.

sst_bk1_quantilevalue.Description: Block 1: 1 minus total percent inhibition on all Stop trials.

sst_bk2_percent_inhib.Description: Block 2: percent inhibition on all Stop trials.

sst_bk1_ssd50.Description: Block 1: mean of all SSD values from both ladders.

sst_ses_stdev_rt.Description: Session: standard deviation of RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_bk2_pctinhib_ladder1.Description: Block 2: percent inhibition on Stop trials from Ladder 1.

sst_ses_ssrt_quant.Description: Session: SSRT. Quantile RT minus SSD50 (mean of all SSD values from both ladders). Recommended SSRT value to use.

sst_bk1_quant_rt.Description: Block 1: quantile calculation of all correct Go RT values (from selecting point in CorrectGo RT distribution based on Block 1 Quantile Value)

sst_ses_median_rt.Description: Session: median RT on all correct Go trials (where RT ! 0)

sst_ses_ladder2mean.Description: Session: mean of all SSD values from Ladder 2.

sst_bk1_ladder2mean.Description: Block 1: mean of all SSD values from Ladder 2.

sst_ses_direction_errors.Description: Session: number of incorrect Go trials.

sst_bk2_ladder1mean.Description: Block 2: mean of all SSD values from Ladder 1.

sst_bk2_pctinhib_ladder2.Description: Block 2: percent inhibition on Stop trials from Ladder 2.

sst_bk1_endtrial.Description: Block 1: End Trial. Total recorded trials of block 1 (should be 128).

sst_bk2_quantilevalue.Description: Block 2: 1 minus total percent inhibition on all Stop trials.
